alert.note: Alert for Jo Daviess (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 8:54AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Jo Daviess, northwestern Jackson and central Dubuque Counties through 945 AM CDT... At 852 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm producing heavy rainfall over Galena, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Heavy Rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Torrential rainfall, reducing visibilities and leading to some ponding on the roads. Locations impacted include... Dubuque, Galena, Asbury, Bellevue, Stockton, East Dubuque, Peosta, Hanover, Elizabeth, Woodbine, Scales Mound, Apple River, La Motte, Menominee, Rickardsville, Sherrill, Council Hill, St. Donatus, Centralia and Sageville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
